title: Library
description: A simple library web app that keeps track of the books one has read or wants to read.I created it to practice prototype programming and objects in JavaScript.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: A classic Tic Tac Toe game. This project helped me learn a lot about modules, IIFEs, closures, and scope in JavaScript.

title: Dashboard
description: A dashboard page created mostly with grid. This project taught me a lot about grid in web design.
